name: Skill Moves for Fifa 19
description:
Welcome to Fifa 19 Skill Moves.

You have come to the right place if you want to learn all the Fifa 19 skill moves with respect to your own controller settings.

This app covers all the Fifa 19 skill moves. No need to worry even if you use a custom controller settings. This app allows you to configure your controller setting and then view the skill moves in terms of your own setting. This makes it very easy to practice any skill moves you want. By default, it comes with the standard "Classic" and "Alternate" controller configuration. The app allows adding more configurations. In addition to this, you can create your own list of favorite skills.

Features:

- Cover all Fifa 19 skill moves
- Configure your own (custom) controller buttons settings that automatically reflects in the skill moves
- Support both Playstation and Xbox
- Create your favorite list of skill moves
- Easily search any skills you want
- View the skill moves categorized by their star level
